title: FS T206 Ty Cobb Bat Off PSA 5 nice
author: Peter_Spaeth

posts.post_title: FS T206 Ty Cobb Bat Off PSA 5 nice
posts.post_content: Very nice for the grade, EX MT eye appeal.  $3250 dlvd.
Beauty Peter, not sure what PSA was looking at. Looks like at least a 5.5 to me....
Thanks Kevin.  It's a very nice card, but I am not one ever to say cards are wrongly graded.

Very good centering for this example as well. For some reason (perhaps where it was located on the sheet when stacked and cut), the Bat Off variation seems to always be off center, either mostly l/r and less so t/b.
Good luck w/the sale.
-C.
Beautiful card, Peter! I find myself wishing I had about $3,000 bucks extra in my pocket right now.
